common.utilities — Misc. Functions¶

This module contains miscellaneous functions such as prime number generation, etc.

common.utilities.comb(n, k)[source]¶

Computes the combination of k elements in n

common.utilities.make_hashable(x)[source]¶

Makes a recursive structure hashable.

This function transforms the argument x from list to tuples, and from dict to tuples of tuples, and set to frozenset

The function is applied recursively is x is a list that contains lists for instance.

Parameters:x – the structure to make hashable
Returns:the argument x transformed to be hashable by python
Return type:any
common.utilities.pprinttable(headers, rows)[source]¶

Prints a table with headers.

Used to print nodes’ routing tables, mainly.

Parameters:
  • headers (list of str) – the column titles
  • rows (list of list of any) – the rows and data they contain (must contain lists all of the same size, and of the same size as header)
common.utilities.print_recursive_structure(data)[source]¶

Prints a recusrsive structure.

Adds indentations, and handles dict, list, sets, and defaultdict.

Used for debug purposes.

common.utilities.range1(*args)[source]¶

Simple alias for range, with an inclusive upper bound.

For instance, range1(0, 10) is equivalent to range(0, 11)
